CustomField.description: Guided imagery help text to inform the user that only a zip code is required to populate state and country. If the user is using salesforce1, then it will merely display text rather than an image. 3/2017
CustomField.formula: IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed = "Theme3", IMAGE("/resource/1488547561000/ZipCodeTip", "Zip",75,400), "Edit the record to use the Address Search function")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please report any erroneous zip code mappings
CustomField.label: Address Help
